results.title: Captain Marvel
results.overview: The story follows Carol Danvers as she becomes one of the universeâ€™s most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races. Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel is an all-new adventure from a previously unseen period in the history of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

results.title: Marvel One-Shot: Item 47
results.overview: Benny and Claire, a down on their luck couple find a discarded Chitauri gun, referred to as 'Item 47'...

results.title: Marvel One-Shot: Agent Carter
results.overview: The film takes place one year after the events of Captain America: The First Avenger, in which Agent Carter, a member of the Strategic Scientific Reserve, is in search of the mysterious Zodiac.

results.title: Marvel One-Shot: The Consultant
results.overview: Agent Coulson informs Agent Sitwell that the World Security Council wishes Emil Blonsky to be released from prison to join the Avengers Initiative. As Nick Fury doesn't want to release Blonsky, the two agents decide to send a patsy to sabotage the meeting...

results.title: Phineas and Ferb: Mission Marvel
results.overview: When Dr. Doofenshmirtz's latest invention causes the Marvel heroes to lose their powers, they team up with Phineas and Ferb to save the world from Doofenshmirtz and the Marvel villains.

results.original_title: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
results.title: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
results.overview: A documentary filmmaker interviews the now-famous Trevor Slattery from behind bars.

results.title: Marvel Studios: Assembling a Universe
results.overview: A look at the story behind Marvel Studios and the Marvel Cinematic Universe, featuring interviews and behind-the-scenes footage from all of the Marvel films, the Marvel One-Shots and "Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D."

results.title: Marvel Rising: Secret Warriors
results.overview: When a threat no one could have expected bears down on the Marvel Universe, this ragtag, untrained band of teens have no choice but to rise together and prove to the world that sometimes the difference between a 'hero' and 'misfit' is just in the name.

results.original_title: Marvel One-Shot: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Thor's Hammer
results.title: Marvel One-Shot: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Thor's Hammer
results.overview: Agent Coulson stops at a convenience store and deals with a coincidental robbery during his visit.

results.original_title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Maximum Overload
results.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Maximum Overload
results.overview: Villainous Loki is amassing an army to conquer Earth! His antics are keeping Spider-Man and S.H.I.E.L.D. busy as they tackle a host of bad guys.

results.title: Captain Marvel 2
results.overview: Upcoming sequel to Captain Marvel (2019).

results.original_title: Marvel: 75 Years, From Pulp to Pop!
results.title: Marvel: 75 Years, From Pulp to Pop!
results.overview: In celebration of the publisher's 75th anniversary, the hour-long special will take a detailed look at the company's journey from fledgling comics publisher to multi-media juggernaut. Hosted by Emily VanCamp (S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent Sharon Carter), the documentary-style feature will include interviews with comic book icons, pop culture authorities, and Hollywood stars.  The special also promises an "extraordinary peek into Marvel's future!" Might Marvel release the first official footage from next year's Avengers: Age of Ultron or Ant-Man? If they do, you'll know about it here.

results.title: Adventures of Captain Marvel
results.overview: On a scientific expedition to Siam young Billy Batson is given the ability to change himself into the super-powered Captain Marvel by the wizard Shazam, who tells him his powers will last only as long as the Golden Scorpion idol is threatened. Finding the idol, the scientists realize it could be the most powerful weapon in the world and remove the lenses that energize it, distributing them among themselves so that no one would be able to use the idol by himself. Back in the US, Billy Batson, as Captain Marvel, wages a battle against an evil, hooded figure, the Scorpion, who hopes to accumulate all five lenses, thereby gaining control of the super-powerful weapon

results.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled!
results.original_title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled!
results.overview: In "LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled!," the Avengers prepare for a party at Stark Tower and notice that Iron Man is acting strange. After some investigation, they discover that the evil Ultron has taken control of Iron Man and his armor as part of his scheme to take over the world. It's up to Captain America, the Hulk, Thor, Vision, Black Widow, Hawkeye and their friends (Spider-Man, Iron Spider, and special guest star Ant-Man) to rescue Iron Man from Ultron's clutches and defeat the super villain before he causes even more destruction and chaos.

results.title: The Avengers
results.overview: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!

results.title: Inhumans: The First Chapter
results.overview: After the Royal Family of Inhumans is splintered by a military coup, they barely escape to Hawaii where their surprising interactions with the lush world and humanity around them may prove to not only save them, but Earth itself.

results.title: Shazam!
results.overview: A boy is given the ability to become an adult superhero in times of need with a single magic word.

results.title: Marvellous
results.overview: Dramatisation of the true story of the life of Neil "Nello" Baldwin.  Born with a mild learning disability but without the burden of social embarrassment & how his inexhaustible ability to see the good in any situation overcame any stigma society tried to label him with.

results.title: Marvel Rising: Heart of Iron
results.overview: Ironheart, AKA Riri Williams (voiced by Sofia Wylie), who is having difficulty adjusting to college life as the youngest student there then the college's engineering lab is demolished by an alien and kidnaps her best friend. Inspired by Iron Man, she develops a plan to save her friend. The special will also feature appearances by Iron Man (voiced by Mick Wingert) and a new character named A.M.I. (voiced by Melanie Minichino).

results.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Black Panther - Trouble in Wakanda
results.original_title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Black Panther - Trouble in Wakanda
results.overview: After speaking at the Wakanda Embassy, Black Panther fights Thanos and fends him off with the help of fellow Avengers Captain America, Thor, Iron Man, Hulk, and Black Widow. After regaining conscious, Thanos is approached by Erik Killmonger and Ulysses Klaue in a plot where they will obtain the Vibranium in Wakanda to empower Thanos. When Black Panther discovers this plot, he must work with Shuri, Okoye, and the Avengers to defeat them.
